SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A. * FROM( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(BOARD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARD_DT, READ_COUNT FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
